data.current_description: Read a page of invoices. Control what is returned via the `properties` query param.
data.summary_suggestion: List invoices with pagination and filtering
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated list of invoices. Use the `properties` query parameter to specify which invoice fields to return. Supports filtering, sorting, and pagination controls. Returns a page of SimplePublicObject records containing the requested invoice properties.
data.reasoning: Original summary 'List' is too generic. Description lacks details about pagination support, return type, and filtering capabilities. Enhanced version clarifies pagination, property selection, and return schema for better AI agent understanding of when to use this operation.

message: Operation 'post-/crm/v3/objects/invoices_create' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_side_effects. Summary 'Create' is too vague. Original description has grammatical issues ('a invoice') and lacks clarity on input schema and side effects. Enhanced version specifies input/output schemas, clarifies that the invoice is persisted, and uses consistent terminology with the API context.

data.current_description: Create a invoice with the given properties and return a copy of the object, including the ID. Documentation and examples for creating standard invoices is provided.
data.description_suggestion: Creates a new invoice with the provided properties. Accepts a SimplePublicObjectInput containing invoice details. Returns the created invoice as a SimplePublicObject with the assigned ID and all provided properties. The invoice is immediately persisted and available for retrieval.
data.reasoning: Summary 'Create' is too vague. Original description has grammatical issues ('a invoice') and lacks clarity on input schema and side effects. Enhanced version specifies input/output schemas, clarifies that the invoice is persisted, and uses consistent terminology with the API context.

Description is verbose and uses generic 'Object' terminology. Improved version uses domain-specific 'invoice' terminology, clarifies the operation's purpose, and better explains parameter usage for AI agent understanding.

data.current_description: Read an Object identified by `{invoiceId}`. `{invoiceId}` refers to the internal object ID by default, or optionally any unique property value as specified by the `idProperty` query param.  Control what is returned via the `properties` query param.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve a single invoice by ID
data.description_suggestion: Retrieve a single invoice record by its internal ID or a unique property value. Use the `idProperty` query parameter to specify a custom unique identifier. Use the `properties` query parameter to control which fields are returned in the response.
data.reasoning: Original summary 'Read' is too generic and lacks domain context. Description is verbose and uses generic 'Object' terminology. Improved version uses domain-specific 'invoice' terminology, clarifies the operation's purpose, and better explains parameter usage for AI agent understanding.

data.current_description: Move an Object identified by `{invoiceId}` to the recycling bin.
data.description_suggestion: Move an invoice identified by `{invoiceId}` to the recycling bin. The invoice is soft-deleted and can be restored. `{invoiceId}` refers to the internal object ID by default, or optionally any unique property value as specified by the `idProperty` query parameter.
data.reasoning: Summary 'Archive' lacks domain context and action clarity. Description uses generic 'Object' terminology and doesn't explain that this is a soft-delete operation or mention the idProperty parameter option. Improved version adds domain specificity, clarifies the soft-delete nature, and documents parameter flexibility.

message: Operation 'patch-/crm/v3/objects/invoices/{invoiceId}_update' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, inconsistent_terminology. Summary 'Update' is too generic and lacks domain context. Description uses inconsistent terminology ('Object' vs domain-specific context) and is overly verbose. Improved version adds domain specificity, simplifies explanation while retaining key details about partial updates, error handling, and property clearing.

data.current_description: Perform a partial update of an Object identified by `{invoiceId}`or optionally a unique property value as specified by the `idProperty` query param. `{invoiceId}` refers to the internal object ID by default, and the `idProperty` query param refers to a property whose values are unique for the object. Provided property values will be overwritten. Read-only and non-existent properties will result in an error. Properties values can be cleared by passing an empty string.
data.description_suggestion: Perform a partial update of an invoice identified by `{invoiceId}` or optionally a unique property value via the `idProperty` query parameter. Only provided properties will be updated. Read-only and non-existent properties will cause an error. Property values can be cleared by passing an empty string.
data.reasoning: Summary 'Update' is too generic and lacks domain context. Description uses inconsistent terminology ('Object' vs domain-specific context) and is overly verbose. Improved version adds domain specificity, simplifies explanation while retaining key details about partial updates, error handling, and property clearing.

data.current_summary: Archive a batch of invoices by ID
data.description_suggestion: Move multiple invoices to the recycling bin in a single batch operation. Invoices are soft-deleted and can be restored. Accepts a batch of invoice IDs to archive. Returns status for each invoice in the batch.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and action-oriented. However, description is completely missing. Added description explaining the batch operation's purpose, that it's a soft-delete, and what the response contains for better AI agent understanding.

data.current_summary: Update a batch of invoices by internal ID, or unique property values
data.description_suggestion: Perform partial updates on multiple invoices in a single batch operation.
